    • Uses of LightList in com.jme.scene

      Fields in com.jme.scene declared as LightList 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected LightList Spatial.localLights
      LightList
      protected LightList Spatial.worldLights  
      Methods in com.jme.scene that return LightList 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LightList Spatial.getLocalLightList()
      Returns the local LightList, which are the lights that were directly attached to this Spatial through the Spatial.addLight(com.jme.light.Light) and Spatial.removeLight(com.jme.light.Light) methods.
      LightList Spatial.getWorldLightList()
      Returns the world LightList, containing the lights combined from all this Spatial's parents up to and including this Spatial's lights.
